title: Journey Orchestration Step Event Action Execution Fields
description: This Mixin will have Journey Action Metadata Fields

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journey/.title: Journey Orchestration for creating user journey.

actionId.title: actionId
actionId.description: Id of the action that is being executed

actionName.title: actionName
actionName.description: Name of the action If no name has been set, the stepName will be taken

actionParameterized.title: actionParameterized
actionParameterized.description: Indicates if the action is parameterized or not

actionExecTime.title: actionExecTime
actionExecTime.description: The amount of time (in millis) taken to execute a current action

actionExecError.title: actionExecError
actionExecError.description: Type of error that happens when the action is called.

actionExecErrorCode.title: actionExecErrorCode
actionExecErrorCode.description: Code for action execution error. Present if the error has a code, such as an HTTP one

actionBusinessType.title: actionBusinessType
actionBusinessType.description: What type of action it is. It could be ACS, Business  Action, SMS etc.

actionSchedulerCount.title: actionSchedulerCount
actionSchedulerCount.description: count of scheduler notification requests sent to the scheduler service during the step processing
